meanings.definition: Tending to revert or return to a previous state or condition.
meanings.sent1: The old clock was revertive, always going back to the same time.
meanings.sent2: Her revertive behavior showed a strong attachment to tradition.
meanings.sent3: The revertive cat kept going back to its favorite spot on the windowsill.
meanings.sent4: His revertive nature made him feel like a time traveler in his own life.
meanings.sent5: The revertive pattern in the fabric reminded her of waves returning to the shore.
